title.jp: Fuyu no Hi, Unmei no Yoru

synopsis: Shirou Emiya's life was saved by Kiritsugu Emiya during the great Fuyuki City fire ten years ago. After school one day, he witnesses a battle between two Servants. Lancer, who realized that someone has been watching this battle that should not be seen, tries to kill Shirou on his Master's orders. Shirou was resuscitated by Rin, but he is attacked by Lancer again that night. While Shirou bears the brunt of Lancer's attacks, a Servant is summoned in front of his eyes. (Source: Official Site)

Shirou goes to the Fuyuki Church with Rin, who had rushed to the Emiya estate after Lancer's attack. Shirou is told about the Holy Grail Wars by Kotomine Kirei, its overseer, and is shocked by what he hears; however, when he learns that the great fire 10 years ago, which he himself was injured in, was caused by the Holy Grail War, he decides to fight in it as a Master. (Source: Official Site)

After Shirou and the others leave the church, their way is blocked by a Servant and a little girl who introduces herself as Illyasviel. Rin and the others find themselves hard pressed by Berserker's overwhelming might. In his very first battle, Shirou learns just how powerless he truly is. (Source: Official Site)

Summoned by Fujimura, Shirou and Saber set out to his school. Shirou tries to explain away Saber, who is unable to dematerialize, but Fujimura and Sakura both end up staying at Shirou's house somehow... Elsewhere, Rin had gone to visit the site of the gas leak and, based on faint traces of mana there, determines that Caster was behind it. (Source: Official Site)

Shirou goes to school without Saber. Rin, annoyed at Shirou for acting alone, waits until no one is around and attacks him. Rin corners him, but then they hear a female student scream. When they call a truce and go to where the scream came from, they find... (Source: Official Site)

Rin and Shirou have formed a truce to deal with the other Master that is hiding in the school. But no sooner have they done so when Shinji tells Shirou that he is Rider’s Master and asks him to work together. That night, Shirou had been practicing magic in the storehouse, but the next thing he knows, he finds himself at Ryudou Temple, which Caster has made into her lair. (Source: Official Site)

When Saber arrives at Ryudou Temple to rescue Shirou, she finds her way blocked by Assassin. Saber is unable to break through his skill with the sword, which is far beyond what one would expect from the Assassin class. Elsewhere, Archer and Caster face off in the courtyard of Ryudou Temple, where Shirou is being held. As they talk, Shirou is disgusted by Archer’s way of thinking. (Source: Official Site)

title.jp: Fuyu no Hi, Kokoro no Shozai

synopsis: After training with Saber, Shirou goes to school. During lunch recess, Shirou gets fresh confirmation of his united front with Rin, but at that moment, the magic circle that had been laid out at the school is activated. Shirou uses a Command Seal and summons Saber, and he and Rin set out to reach Shinji to put an end to the circle. (Source: Official Site)

Rider, who protected Shinji from Caster, is eliminated. Rin had concluded that Caster’s Master is someone at school, but she focuses instead on formulating a strategy to smooth over Archer and Shirou’s relationship. Elsewhere, Shinji, who has lost his Servant, goes to Kirei to seek refuge at the church. When Shinji expresses his dissatisfaction with Rider, Kirei informs him that a new Servant is available. (Source: Official Site)

Rin, having concluded from Issei’s testimony that Kuzuki is Caster’s Master, puts together a plan to attack him with Shirou that same day. Seeing Kuzuki offer no resistance when struck by Rin’s sneak attack, Shirou runs out to him, but then Caster appears. When Shirou lays out Caster’s atrocities and tries to win Kuzuki over, Kuzuki reveals his true nature. (Source: Official Site)

Shirou and the others fight off Kuzuki and Caster. However, Shirou loses all feeling in the left half of his body as a result of forcibly using too much mana. Rin visits him at home the following day under the pretext that he missed their regular check-in, but she then stays the night for some reason. And then, when Archer sees Shirou’s condition, he says that he has seen such symptoms before. (Source: Official Site)

The morning after Rin spends the night, Shirou and Saber go out on a date with Rin at her suggestion. Forgetting about the fighting, the three of them unwind, but they come under attack from Caster once again. Caster presses Shirou, who can’t fight back because she’s taken Fujimura hostage, to join her. Shirou flatly rejects her, but Shirou has both his Command Seals and Saber stolen from him by Caster, who becomes enraged at his response. (Source: Official Site)
